p:
Waghmare etÂ al. reported the synthesis of substituted pyrimidine containing benzothiazole derivative 35 ( Figure 21) by refluxing BTAs with bis-methylthio methylene malononitrile, and tested their anticancer activity against 18 different cell lines. The scaffold 35 possessed excellent anticancer activity with a good percentage of growth inhibition against lung cancer, breast cancer and renal cancer cell lines. The good anticancer activity of derivative 35 is due to the presence of two methyl and one SCH 3 groups in its structure
41 .
